query:
SELECT 
  po.id,
  po.orderNumber,
  po.tenantId,
  t.name as tenantName,
  poi.productId,
  p.sku,
  p.description as productName,
  poi.quantity
FROM pickingOrders po
LEFT JOIN tenants t ON po.tenantId = t.id
LEFT JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.orderId
LEFT JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
WHERE po.id IN (180001, 180002)
ORDER BY po.id, poi.productId;
